titles.title: Honoring the Virgin Islands National Guard on its 50th anniversary.
Honoring the Virgin Islands National Guard on its 50th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution honors and commends the Virgin Islands National Guard for its 50 years of service to the Virgin Islands and United States. Additionally, the resolution thanks the thousands of men and women who have served in the Virgin Islands National Guard.
